Class PasswordPrompt

java.lang.Object
  PasswordPrompt

public class PasswordPrompt
extends java.lang.Object

Allows us to read input from the keyboard. Makes code for reading strings from Standard-in not look like dicks.

Revision History:

  • April 09, 2008, Benjamin Gauronskas
    • Created file.

public static void promptUser()
Prompts the user for input. Alarm goes off if they do not enter the correct password in three tries.
